title: Nerfing illaoi
body:
Riot you done fucked up when you made illaoi, she is so fucking strong and is not fun in anyway shape or form nerf the shit out of her or you will continue to get complaints like this from others that feel the same as me, im mean where in your right mind did you think her tentical healing her was a good idea, she can never die, no matter how bad she is she will win lane.
Plz nerf her or people will begin to hate this game.

replies.body:
I'm not ever hating on you Damocracy, I just post how I feel.
No spite, I'm objective.

No, counter pick {{champion:420}}  ffs. If you had first pick as top then you got counter picked.
You built no defense on {{champion:23}}  while {{champion:420}} got {{item:3047}} , {{item:3812}}  and {{item:3053}}.
When she ulted did you stay and fight or did you run out of it then re engage?
You didn't upgrade your boots so you were easy to grab and fight in her ulty.
You did the least damage to champs where as {{champion:420}} did the most on the enemy team meaning she was in team fights and you were not as you had no assists.
To me it also looks like you wasted TP to get back to lane while {{champion:420}} used TP to gank bot lane, am right?

Wait a minute... did he lose to Illaoi as Trynd? How?

Nevermind he built Phantom BT with Warlord's, and took TP against Illaoi.
I dunno, was just going by match history.

...............................................................................................................

Nothing more needs to be said. Bronzes to Golds shouldn't be complaining, but at least Golds know what they are doing. Illaoi is no where close to broken, I haven't seen one in months. That is like saying Tryndamere is broken, if you fought him 1v1 in his ult. I'm willing to bet you run up to her during a gank, get pulled and ulted and she double kills and then you complain.

Illaoi is so useless. Just run out of her ult if you HAVE to group around her, and dodge her Q and E in lane. What the heck to you mean she can never die? Even if you are dumb enough to let her spam heal you still probably don't buy or take grievous wounds. And yes, if she is behind she is garbage like most champions. Obviously skill is not a factor into your games nor mine. It's bronze.

Bad players complain about champs because they are bad.
Just look at all the countless threads on Yasuo.

Rito balance champs based on high level play, not scrubs that can't get out of bronze and only build items based on what they found as a guide online.
Learn how to counter your lane, learn how to build to a situation (not just what a guide tells you), and fucking LEARN HOW TO PLAY.

Illaoi is nowhere near the list of "Rito plz" champ nerfs, this is seriously just a L2P issue.
Hate to say it but I agree with you.
